divs: Sighting DetailsSomething really big going on here.craft had many color lights.Dogs were barking like crazy.I am here onvacation from Long Island ,New York and I finally can say for sure this was the real deal.I was in the USAF and know what a plane looks like.Have my camera ,but object is between the trees ,impossible to focus on it
Summary: unbelievable . Aliens are here.Something really big going on here.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wake Forest
There were no other sightings in Wake Forest on or around January 14th 2008
